title: Athletism — Rowing (Elite) — Phase 9: Sharpening & Taper
goal: Maintain freshness, keep touch with pace, reduce volume ~40–50%, preserve intensity.

warmup: Technical drills: pick drill / pause @ arms-only / legs-only
main: Boat: 3x6' @24–28 spm with final 2' race cadence
cooldown: Light stretching (Posterior chain, lats, hip flexors)

notes: Week 1: Volume ↓30–35%. Week 2: Volume ↓45–55%. Two quality sessions/weekly; no DOMS work.
